categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Robert Watts (born May 23, 1938) was a production manager on A New Hope, an associate producer on The Empire Strikes Back, and a co-producer on Return of the Jedi. He also played Lieutenant Watts in Return of the Jedi.
Jeremy Bulloch who played Boba Fett for most of Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back and all of Return of the Jedi is Watts' half-brother.
